thread.title: Foxconn Corporate IP Auction Will Be Held by ICAP Patent Brokerage
thread.title_full: Foxconn Corporate IP Auction Will Be Held by ICAP Patent Brokerage - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Foxconn Corporate IP Auction Will Be Held by ICAP Patent Brokerage
text:
ICAP Patent Brokerage will represent Foxconn Technology Group in an upcoming sealed-bid auction of intellectual property assets, to be held November 19th, 2015. The auction will feature 27 distinct portfolios, with detailed lot information featured on the Foxconn Corporate Auction web page.
New York, NY
ICAP Patent Brokerage will represent Foxconn Technology Group in an upcoming sealed-bid auction of intellectual property assets, to be held November 19th, 2015. The auction will feature 27 distinct portfolios, with detailed lot information featured on the Foxconn Corporate Auction web page .
“Foxconn is a global powerhouse in electronics manufacturing, with a deep commitment to R&D and intellectual property. ICAP Patent Brokerage, the global leader in IP brokerage, will be working in conjunction with MiiCs & Partners, which is exclusively authorized to monetize the IP assets of Foxconn Technology Group. This is an exciting partnership for everyone involved,” said Dean Becker, CEO of ICAP Patent Brokerage.
The auction will cover a wide range of technology areas, including mobile devices (and applications) and cameras/lenses, LCD projectors and displays, flash memory, audio/video processing and playback, cable modems, batteries & chargers, health software, navigation, optical systems and connectors, wireless access points, television, VOIP, and more.
Foxconn is the world's largest electronics contractor manufacturer, and the world's third largest information technology company by revenue. Foxconn is responsible for the manufacture of such well-known products as the Blackberry, Apple iPad, Apple iPhone, Amazon Kindle, Sony PlayStation 4, Microsoft Xbox One, and the Nintendo Wii U.
Foxconn is a leader in the intellectual property space, and one of the top 20 patent holders world-wide, with over 64,000 granted patents. Foxconn is a major investor in technology research, with annual R&D spending exceeding USD$50 million.
Corporate auctions are familiar territory for ICAP Patent Brokerage, which recently held auctions on behalf of Xerox and Alcatel-Lucent. Additional high-profile corporate auctions will be announced in upcoming months. Companies with an interest in monetizing large or significant patent portfolios are encouraged to contact the brokerage.
TTo learn more about the intellectual property available for sale in this portfolio:
Contact Michelle Tyler of ICAP Patent Brokerage at (312) 327-4438 or via email at michelle(at)icapip(dot)com.
Follow us on Twitter ( @ICAP_IP ) and join our LinkedIn group.
About ICAP Patent Brokerage
ICAP Patent Brokerage is the world's largest intellectual property brokerage and patent auction firm, leveraging the talents of experienced patent brokers to match buyers and sellers for the sale of patents and other intellectual property assets. It is the brokerage of choice for large-scale corporate patent auctions. With multiple transaction platforms and unparalleled industry knowledge, including experience with trademarks, brands, intellectual property licensing, and UCC sales, ICAP Patent Brokerage is the global leader in the transaction of intellectual property.
